Title: Spider-Man: Far from Home
Writer: Steve Ditko (based on the Marvel comic book by), Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comic book by), Chris McKenna (screenplay by), Erik Sommers (screenplay by)
Actors: Angourie Rice, Zendaya, Jon Favreau, Tom Holland
Plot: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.
